Kim Jong Il praised in S. Korea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il praised in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A campaign to "Get a Profound Knowledge of General Kim Jong Il" is now under way among people from all walks of life in South Korea on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, according to Seoul-based radio voice of national salvation.
 Kim Jong Il's works and books introducing his revolutionary activities and virtues are avidly read by political and academic circles, students, workers as well as housewives and discs on which rodong sinmun articles on his traits as a great man are recorded are in wide use.

articles.title: Hong Chang Su and his mother visit Korean Hall of Chongryon
articles.content:
Hong Chang Su and his mother visit Korean Hall of Chongryon 
    Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Labour Hero and People's Sportsman Hong Chang Su, a pro-boxing champion, visited the Korean Hall in Tokyo on July 2 together with his mother.
 They were greeted by chairman So Man Sul and chief vice-chairman Ho Jong Man of the central standing committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and others.    
 So Man Sul said that the news of his reception of the title of Labour Hero, the highest honor of the DPRK citizens, delighted Chongryon officials and compatriots and his pride is also pride of Chongryon and compatriots.

Wonder takes place
Korean wrestlers prove successful
articles.content:
Korean wrestlers prove successful 
    Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Korean wrestler Ri Jong Myong won a gold medal in the freestyle 42 kg event at the second junior Asian Greco-Roman style and freestyle wrestling championships held in Teheran.
 In the final he outpointed a Kazakh wrestler 5-4, who defeated Japanese, Iranian and Taipei players.    
 Kim Kwang Sik carried off a silver medal in the Greco-Roman 42 kg, and Won Chol Min, Yang Chun Song and Kim Chung Il bagged bronze medals in the freestyle 46 kg, freestyle 50 kg and freestyle 54 kg events respectively.
